channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2-year yield plunges by most since September on mild core CPI inflation reading
item.description: U.S. government debt aggressively rallied after the monthly core inflation reading from Wednesday’s consumer-price index came in softer than expected,...

item.title: Most mutual funds don’t beat the market — but what’s ‘the market’ anyway?
item.description: The S&P 500 is a high bar for fund managers. The Dow? Not as much.

item.title: Oil prices end higher as traders weigh demand prospects, supply risks

item.title: My wife, 72, and I, 80, have two houses and 56 acres of land. Our daughter is a joint tenant on our real estate. Do we need a will?
item.description: This couple has done a lot to clear the path ahead — but they have made one big mistake.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
item.description: Gold settled 1.3% higher and silver rose 3.9%, with both metals up for two consecutive sessions.

item.title: Quantum-computing stocks could be rich takeover targets. Here’s what to know.

item.title: A Good Year for Wall Street Isn't the Same as a Good Year for Banking
item.description: Even as trading and dealmaking surge, lending growth is muted.
